TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IndexOutOfRangeException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class IndexOutOfRangeException Inherits SystemException
public ref class IndexOutOfRangeException sealed : SystemException

summary.span: 试图访问索引超出界限的数组或集合的元素时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to access an element of an array or collection with an index that is outside its bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的无效索引用于访问数组或集合的成员或用于读取或写入从缓冲区中的特定位置时将引发异常。An exception is thrown when an invalid index is used to access a member of an array or a collection, or to read or write from a particular location in a buffer. 此异常继承类但添加任何独特的成员。This exception inherits from the class but adds no unique members. 通常情况下，导致开发人员错误引发异常。Typically, an exception is thrown as a result of developer error. 而不是处理异常，应诊断错误的原因并更正你的代码。Instead of handling the exception, you should diagnose the cause of the error and correct your code. 错误的最常见原因是：The most common causes of the error are: - 从零开始的数组或集合的上限为 1，忘记少于其成员或元素，如下面的示例说明了。Forgetting that the upper bound of a collection or a zero-based array is one less than its number of members or elements, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/length1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/length1.vb#3)] 若要更正此错误，可以使用如下所示的代码。To correct the error, you can use code like the following. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/length2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/length2.vb#4)] 或者，而不是通过它们的索引，循环访问数组中的所有元素，可以使用`foreach`语句 （在 C#) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic) 语句。Alternately, instead of iterating all the elements in the array by their index, you can use the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each` statement (in Visual Basic). - 尝试将数组元素分配到另一个数组不充分维度并具有较少的原始数组元素。Attempting to assign an array element to another array that has not been adequately dimensioned and that has fewer elements than the original array. 下面的示例尝试分配中的最后一个元素`value1`中的同一元素的数组`value2`数组。The following example attempts to assign the last element in the `value1` array to the same element in the `value2` array. 但是，`value2`已错误地划分数组具有六个而不是七个元素。However, the `value2` array has been incorrectly dimensioned to have six instead of seven elements. 因此，赋值会引发异常。As a result, the assignment throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/Uninit1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/Uninit1.vb#10)] - 使用值的搜索方法循环访问数组或集合的特定索引位置开始的一部分返回。Using a value returned by a search method to iterate a portion of an array or collection starting at a particular index position. 如果你忘记了检查是否搜索操作找到匹配项，则运行时会引发异常，如本示例中所示。If you forget to check whether the search operation found a match, the runtime throws an exception, as shown in this example. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/negative1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/negative1.vb#5)] 在这种情况下，方法返回-1，这是无效的索引值，它无法找到匹配项时。In this case, the method returns -1, which is an invalid index value, when it fails to find a match. 若要更正此错误，搜索方法的返回值之前循环访问数组中，检查上，在此示例中所示。To correct this error, check the search method's return value before iterating the array, as shown in this example. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/negative2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/negative2.vb#6)] - 尝试使用或枚举结果集、 集合或测试是否返回的对象具有任何有效的数据的情况下由查询返回的数组。Trying to use or enumerate a result set, collection, or array returned by a query without testing whether the returned object has any valid data. - 使用计算的值定义的起始索引、 的结束索引或要迭代的项目数。Using a computed value to define the starting index, the ending index, or the number of items to be iterated. 如果计算结果是意外，可能会导致异常。If the result of the computation is unexpected, it might result in an exception. 应检查应用程序的逻辑在计算索引值，并循环访问数组或集合之前验证值。You should check your program's logic in calculating the index value and validate the value before iterating the array or collection. 以下条件必须同时为 true;否则为引发异常：The following conditions must all be true; otherwise, an exception is thrown: - 起始索引必须大于或等于的维度的数组，它想要循环访问，或大于或等于 0 的集合。The starting index must be greater than or equal to for the dimension of the array that you want to iterate, or greater than or equal to 0 for a collection. - 结束索引不能超过想要循环访问，或不能大于或等于数组的维度`Count`的集合属性。The ending index cannot exceed for the dimension of the array that you want to iterate, or cannot be greater than or equal to the `Count` property of a collection. - 下面的公式必须是你想要循环访问数组的维度，则返回 true:The following equation must be true for the dimension of the array that you want to iterate: ``` start_index >= lower_bound And start_index + items_to_iterate – 1 <= upper_bound ``` 一个集合，必须满足以下公式：For a collection, the following equation must be true: ``` start_index >= 0 And start_index + items_to_iterate <= Count ``` > [!TIP] > 数组或集合的起始索引绝不能是负数。The starting index of an array or collection can never be a negative number. - 假定数组必须从零开始。Assuming that an array must be zero-based. 可以通过创建不从零开始的数组方法和可以由 COM 互操作，尽管它们不符合 CLS 規格。Arrays that are not zero-based can be created by the method and can be returned by COM interop, although they aren’t CLS-compliant. 下面的示例阐释时尝试进行循环访问由创建的非基于零的数组引发方法。The following example illustrates the that is thrown when you try to iterate a non-zero-based array created by the method. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/nonzero1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/nonzero1.vb#1)] 若要更正该错误，如以下示例所示，可以调用方法而不是进行假设数组的起始索引。To correct the error, as the following example does, you can call the method instead of making assumptions about the starting index of an array. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/nonzero2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/nonzero2.vb#2)] 请注意，当您调用方法以获取数组的起始索引还应调用方法以获取其结束索引。Note that when you call the method to get the starting index of an array, you should also call the method to get its ending index. - 索引和数字数组或集合中该索引处的值，让人困惑。Confusing an index and the value at that index in a numeric array or collection. 使用时，通常会出现此问题`foreach`语句 （在 C#) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic) 语句。This issue usually occurs when using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each` statement (in Visual Basic). 以下示例演示了该问题。The following example illustrates the problem. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/foreach1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/foreach1.vb#7)] 迭代构造返回数组或集合，不是其索引中的每个值。The iteration construct returns each value in an array or collection, not its index. 若要消除此异常，请使用此代码。To eliminate the exception, use this code. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/foreach2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/foreach2.vb#8)] - 无效的列名称提供至属性。Providing an invalid column name to the property. - 违反线程安全性。Violating thread safety. 操作，如读取相同对象，写入到同一对象从多个线程，还是在枚举中的对象从不同的线程可引发如果该对象不访问线程安全的方式。Operations such as reading from the same object, writing to the same object from multiple threads, or enumerating the objects in a from different threads can throw an if the object isn’t accessed in a thread-safe way. 此异常是通常间歇性的因为它依赖于争用条件。This exception is typically intermittent because it relies on a race condition. 使用硬编码的索引值来操作一个数组，很可能正在操作的数组的大小是否意外的索引值不正确或无效，或者引发异常。Using hard-coded index values to manipulate an array is likely to throw an exception if the index value is incorrect or invalid, or if the size of the array being manipulation is unexpected. 若要防止操作引发异常，您可以执行以下操作：To prevent an operation from throwing an exception, you can do the following: - 循环访问数组使用的元素[foreach](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ttw7t8t6.aspx)语句 （在 C#) 或[为每个...下一步](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ebk1751.aspx)构造 （在 Visual Basic) 而不是按索引循环访问元素。Iterate the elements of the array using the [foreach](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ttw7t8t6.aspx) statement (in C#) or the [For Each...Next](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ebk1751.aspx) construct (in Visual Basic) instead of iterating elements by index. - 通过从返回的索引开始的索引循环访问的元素方法，并返回索引的情况直到方法。Iterate the elements by index starting with the index returned by the method and ending with the index returned by the method. - 如果您要分配给另一个数组中的元素，请确保目标数组具有与源数组至少尽可能多的元素通过比较其属性。If you are assigning elements in one array to another, ensure that the target array has at least as many elements as the source array by comparing their properties. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. 以下的中间语言 (IL) 指令引发:The following intermediate language (IL) instructions throw : - ldelem。\<类型 >ldelem.\ - ldelemaldelema - stelem.\stelem.\ 使用 HRESULT COR_E_INDEXOUTOFRANGE，其值 0x80131508。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_INDEXOUTOFRANGE, which has the value 0x80131508.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的描述错误，例如"的数组索引超出了范围。"的消息的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An array index is out of range." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的新的异常使用`message`参数。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `InnerException`）。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
